A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: To me The Last Jedi was an awesome addition to the Star Wars episodic narrative. I have seen it twice in theaters now and both times I was enthralled the entirety of the movie. Rian Johnson did a wonderful job! He brought something new to Star Wars and I am very happy for it. The movie has great storytelling and character development and I felt invested in certain characters even though I had just met them this in this episode. There were some things that I didn't care for as is the case with any movie\, but they did not detract from the movie. I will say that I am not a fan of pop-culture humor and I did find some of that in the movie; sometimes it tried to hard to be humorous\, but most of the time I felt like the humor was fun and worked well with the story. Overall I put this in my top three favorite Star Wars movies. My only gripe is that I have to wait two years to see Episode IX.
